taxes a user makes a payment okay now it's important to clarify that we are

is the customer interaction that we're talking about now we measure these interactions in three states one is a
successful interaction where the customer was able to proceed further and do what they were seeking out to do
second a degraded interaction where a suboptimal experience was delivered to the customer and finally a failed
customer interaction where the customer actually had unavailability with that
